title: El Cohete
subtitle: The Rocket
meta_desc: Learn about rockets in Spanish (cohete, espacio, estrellas, luna) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish transportation, el cohete Spanish, rocket in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
